ingredients: 60  maraschino cherries with stems, 3 tablespoons butter, softened, 3 tablespoons corn syrup, 2 cups sifted confectioners' sugar, 1 pound chocolate confectioners' coating
nutrition: Total Fat 4g 5%, Saturated Fat 2g 11%, Cholesterol 2mg 1%, Sodium 5mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 11g 4%, Dietary Fiber 0g 1%, Total Sugars 5g, Protein 1g, Calcium 6mg 0%, Iron 0mg 2%, Potassium 55mg 1%
